title: Jon Meacham: " And There Was Light"
description: Michael welcomes author and historian Jon Meacham with his new book, "And There Was Light: Abraham Lincoln and the American Struggle." Original air date 19 October 2022. The book was published on 18 October 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Jon Meacham)
